Prompt/Task: Implement physical SMS OTP via Twilio API
Matter: Replaced the simulated console output with real Twilio SMS capability. Configured environment variables (SID, TOKEN, PHONE) and added logic to auto-format phone numbers to +91 (India) for reliable delivery.

Prompt/Task: Remove on-screen OTP hints for security
Matter: Modified verify_otp.html to stop displaying the code in the 'raw_otp' debug field, ensuring users must actually receive the SMS to log in.

Prompt/Task: Add 'Resend OTP' link to verification page
Matter: Implemented a countdown-based or instant resend link that triggers a new random 4-digit code and dispatches a fresh SMS via the FastAPI backend.

Prompt/Task: Fix CSS syntax error in progress bar
Matter: Corrected line 103 of index.html where a curly brace was missing in the style='width: {{...}}%' attribute, which was causing the tracking bars to render as full width or empty.

Prompt/Task: Fix baby cry audio recording & upload
Matter: Debugged the client-side MediaRecorder. Fixed the blob selection logic so that 5-second 'cry' clips are correctly captured and POSTed to the /cry endpoint with a unique filename.

Prompt/Task: Enable cry audio playback in activity logs
Matter: Added HTML5 <audio> players to the 'Recent Activity' cards. Users can now click 'Play' on any cry event to hear the recording immediately.

Prompt/Task: Implement 8-hour night monitoring capture
Matter: Configured the monitoring page to automatically start recording cycles during the 10 PM to 6 AM window. These long-form logs are stored in 'night_recordings' for morning review.

Prompt/Task: Add sleep goal progress bar
Matter: Created a premium-styled progress indicator on the dashboard that calculates sleep duration against the recommended 8-hour daily target.

Prompt/Task: Resolve 500 server error on monitoring dashboard
Matter: Fixed a NullReference error in main.py where the dashboard was attempting to access 'baby' attributes before a baby was registered or when session data was stale.

Prompt/Task: Upgrade backend to JSON-response
Matter: Switched recording and task logging endpoints to return JSON instead of full HTML redirects. This allows the UI to update markers and activity feeds instantly without a page refresh.

Prompt/Task: Create detailed Excel Log with Matter
Matter: Compiled all coding prompts, bug fixes, and feature implementations into a structured Excel file (BabbyTracker_Prompts_Log.xlsx) with technical descriptions of each change.

Prompt/Task: Resolve IDE CSS parsing errors in monitor.html
Matter: Completely removed Jinja syntax from the inline style attribute by using a 'data-progress' attribute and delegating width application to JavaScript. This satisfies the IDE's strict CSS validator.

Prompt/Task: Automated Excel Log Update
Matter: Updated the prompt logging system to capture the entire project history from Dec 2025 to present, ensuring all developmental steps are documented.

Prompt/Task: Enhance Baby Tracker with Offline Sync & Voice Tracking
Matter: Implemented local storage synchronization for offline tracking. Added baby voice/cry recording capablities and night-time summary reports (wake-ups, sleep duration).

Prompt/Task: Parent Controls & SMS Alerts
Matter: Added parent control settings and configured automated SMS alerts for registered mobile numbers when distress is detected.

Prompt/Task: Confirm Pipeline Success
Matter: Verified the CI/CD pipeline execution after recent commits, ensuring that migrations and builds were successful.

Prompt/Task: Fix CSS 'at-rule or selector expected' error
Matter: Resolved a syntax issue in history.html where a Jinja variable in the width calculation was breaking the CSS parser.

Prompt/Task: Fix HTML Property Value Error in History
Matter: Corrected the rendering of confidence scores in the progress bar, ensuring weights and percentages were correctly formatted as strings.

Prompt/Task: Refactor Prediction Page into dedicated route
Matter: Moved the prediction form from the homepage to a dedicated /prediction_page. Updated navigation links and layout templates accordingly.

Prompt/Task: Fix Flask-SQLAlchemy ModuleNotFoundError
Matter: Resolved environment configuration issue by properly installing flask-sqlalchemy and updating requirements.txt.

Prompt/Task: Convert Project Docs to .docx
Matter: Generated Microsoft Word versions of the project documentation for offline reporting and archival purposes.

Prompt/Task: Resolve 404 Font Errors
Matter: Fixed pathing issues for static font assets that were causing browser console errors and incorrect typography rendering.

Prompt/Task: Fix 'Skeleton Page' (Static Assets Load Failure)
Matter: Debugged Flask static file serving. Ensured that CSS and JS bundles were correctly linked and served from the /static/ directory.

Prompt/Task: Fix Docker Build Error (uv pip install)
Matter: Corrected the Dockerfile instructions for 'uv' package manager to ensure dependency installation completes successfully.

Prompt/Task: Automate Docker Hub Push
Matter: Configured GitHub Actions to build and push the BabbyTracker image to Docker Hub on every main branch merge.

Prompt/Task: Add GitHub Action Workflows for Secrets
Matter: Implemented secure secret management in GitHub Actions for handling Docker credentials and API keys.

Prompt/Task: Fix Invalid Container Name Error
Matter: Renamed Docker container from 'speech ' to 'speech_tracker' to remove invalid spaces and satisfy Docker naming conventions.

Prompt/Task: Optimize Docker Build Speed
Matter: Reordered Dockerfile layers to maximize build cache effectiveness, significantly reducing image rebuild times.
